# tibia-ocr

OCR to read Tibia in-game text written in python

## Installation

You can install the package via pip:

```bash
pip install tibia-ocr
```

## Usage

```python
import tibia-ocr

# usage examples here
```

## Known Limitations

- `!` is detected as `i`
- Can not detect spaces
